patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Closed Ready Stance B
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to B forming a right L-stance toward B while executing a middle block to B with the left inner forearm.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Execute a low thrust to B with the right upset finger tip while forming a left walking stance toward B, slipping the left foot to B.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Bring the left foot to the right foot to form a closed stance toward D while executing a side back strike to C with the right back fist, extending the left arm to the side downward. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Move the right foot to A forming a left L-stance toward A while executing a middle block to A with the right inner forearm.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Execute a low thrust to A with the left upset finger tip while forming a right walking stance toward A, slipping the right foot to A.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Bring the right foot to the left foot to form a closed stance toward D while executing a side back strike to C with the left back fist, extending the right arm to the side downward. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a pressing block with an X-fist.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Execute a high vertical punch to D with a twin fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Perform 7 and 8 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Execute a middle front snap kick to D with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 8.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Lower the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Bring the left foot to the right foot forming a closed stance toward F while executing a twin side elbow thrust. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Move the right foot to F in a stamping motion forming a sitting stance toward C while executing a W-shape block to C with the right outer forearm.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Move the left foot to F in a stamping motion turning clockwise to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a W-shape block to D with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Move the left foot to E in a stamping motion turning clockwise to form a sitting stance toward C while executing a W-shape block to C with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Move the right foot to E in a stamping motion turning counter clockwise to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a W-shape block to D with the right outer forearm.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Move the left foot to E in a stamping motion turning clockwise to form a sitting stance toward C while executing a W-shape block to C with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Move the left foot to F in a stamping motion turning clockwise to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a W-shape block to D with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Bring the right foot to the left foot and then move the left foot to D forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a low pushing block to D with the left double forearm.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Extend both hands upward as if to grab the opponent's head while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot to D.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Execute an upward kick with the right knee while pulling both hands downward.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Lower the right foot to the left foot and then move the left foot to C forming a right L-stance toward C while executing a middle guarding block to C with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Execute a low side front snap kick to C with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 22.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Lower the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a high thrust to C with the left flat finger tip
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Move the right foot to C forming a left L-stance toward C while executing a middle guarding block to C with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Execute a low side front snap kick to C with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 25.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Lower the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a high thrust to C with the right flat finger tip.
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Move the right foot to D forming a right L-stance toward C while executing a side back strike to D with the right back fist and a low block to C with the left forearm.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Jump to C forming a right X-stance toward A while executing a pressing block with an X-fist.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a high block to C with the right double forearm.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Move the left foot to B forming a right L-stance toward B while executing a low guarding block to B with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Execute a circular block to BD with the right inner forearm while forming a left walking stance toward B, slipping the left foot to B.
patternSteps.34: Step 33. Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to A forming a left L-stance toward A, at the same time executing a low guarding block to A with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.35: Step 34. Execute a circular block to AD with the left inner forearm while forming a right walking stance toward A, slipping the right foot to A.
patternSteps.36: Step 35. Execute a circular block to CE with the right inner forearm while forming a left walking stance toward CE.
patternSteps.37: Step 36. Execute a circular block to AD with the left inner forearm while forming a right walking stance toward A.
patternSteps.38: Step 37. Move the right foot on line AB to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.39: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
